title: TFR Ep. 593: Moonfall, House Of Gucci, 10 Favorite Films of 2021: 5-1
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris Scalzo and Matt ‘Razzlekhan’ Howell discuss the latest disaster epic from Roland Emmerich, ‘Moonfall’.  This time it’s up to Halle Berry, Patrick Wilson, Samwell himself, John Bradley to save the world from the moon crashing into the Earth.  Oh, and there are some aliens and an AI gone mad. And a bunch of other stuff.  Then it’s on to Ridley Scott’s second film of 2021, ‘House Of Gucci’, featuring Lady Gaga, Adam Driver, and more.  And Jared Leto.  There’s the incendiary rundown of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week. Matt and Chris then close out the show with the wrap up of their 10 Favorite Films of 2021, Films 5-1.  Barb and Star still have time to make the cut…

00:00-13:56: Intro/Moonfall

13:57-27:15: Physical Media Picks

27:16-37:43: House Of Gucci

37:44-57:11: 10 Favorite Films of 2021: 5-1

57:12-58:31: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook

itunes:summary:
This week on The First Run, Chris Scalzo and Matt ‘Razzlekhan’ Howell discuss the latest disaster epic from Roland Emmerich, ‘Moonfall’.  This time it’s up to Halle Berry, Patrick Wilson, Samwell himself, John Bradley to save the world from the moon crashing into the Earth.  Oh, and there are some aliens and an AI gone mad. And a bunch of other stuff.  Then it’s on to Ridley Scott’s second film of 2021, ‘House Of Gucci’, featuring Lady Gaga, Adam Driver, and more.  And Jared Leto.  There’s the incendiary rundown of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week. Matt and Chris then close out the show with the wrap up of their 10 Favorite Films of 2021, Films 5-1.  Barb and Star still have time to make the cut…
